ch.lambdaj.group

Class ArgumentGroupCondition<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.lambdaj.group.GroupCondition<Argument<?>>
      • ch.lambdaj.group.ArgumentGroupCondition<T>

  • public class ArgumentGroupCondition<T>
extends GroupCondition<Argument<?>>
    A GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
    Author:
    Mario Fusco
